author: dims
msg: Let's try another tack w.r.t the builds. Since too many people had problems
with our SNAPSHOT stuff and constant downloads/queries to remote repos.
Am checking in a lib directory with the dependencies and Refer to these
jars from all the maven.xml's. This way, in the middle of a huge 20-30
min build, suddenly you will not get a new say AXIOM jar :) and you can
continue to work even when remote repos are not responsive enough.
*IF* you are extremely PLEASED and HAPPY with the current build, please
let everyone know and we can revert this change. If you are not, then
please suggest additional things we can do to speed things up.

author: rahul
msg: Conform to checkstyle, add missing Javadocs. No functional change.

author: ajith
msg: The new entity resolver treated all URI's as files. Changed that to treat http and https schemes properly
